data.name: Quality Engineering Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's Quality Engineering Center of Excellence delivers comprehensive testing and quality assurance services across functional, performance, and automation testing domains. The CoE provides end-to-end quality engineering solutions including AI-driven test automation, performance testing, accessibility testing, and continuous testing integration. With 1000+ quality engineers across all geographies and 200+ projects in flight, the CoE enables organizations to achieve faster time-to-market, improved test coverage, and reduced QA costs through intelligent automation and advanced testing frameworks.

data.businessValue: Accion's Quality Engineering CoE delivers substantial business value through accelerated testing cycles (80% faster test case generation), enhanced test coverage (up to 95%), significant cost reduction (30-40% QA cost savings), and faster time-to-market (30% reduction). The CoE enables organizations to shift left in their testing approach, reduce defect leakage, improve software quality, and achieve continuous delivery through intelligent automation and AI-driven testing capabilities.
